product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, laying and termination of both ends of earthing cables from earth grid pit to the DCS/ Local panels/ Barrier earth bus bars in trays/ conduits/ trenches as required. At both ends of earth grid/ Instruments of GI wire (12 AWG) in trays and conduits as required excluding earth-pit preparation and electrode installation.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: gi(galvanized iron), location: trays and conduits, excludes: earth-pit preparation and electrode installation

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, laying and termination of both ends of earthing cables from earth grid pit to the DCS/ Local panels/ Barrier earth bus bars in trays/ conduits/ trenches as required. For earthing cable 25 mm² size with PVC insulation.

Laying of copper tube for steam tracing of Instruments, primary impulse lines with steam traps/valve accessories including clamping, supply of clamps termination at both ends, providing and fixing metallic tags and hydraulic testing as per Standard given below but exclusive of supply of tube/ fitting and insulation as per standards For sizes 1/4"/ 6 mm
product_entries.core_product_name: copper tube laying for steam tracing
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: copper, includes: clamping, supply of clamps, termination at both ends, metallic tags, hydraulic testing, excludes: supply of tube/fitting and insulation

original_rows.3: Supply, laying and termination of both ends of earthing cables from earth grid pit to the DCS/ Local panels/ Barrier earth bus bars in trays/ conduits/ trenches as required.
At both ends of earth grid/ Instruments of GI wire (12 AWG) in trays and conduits as required excluding earth-pit preparation and electrode installation.
For earthing cable 25 mm² size with PVC insulation.

Laying of copper tube for steam tracing of Instruments, primary impulse lines with steam traps/valve accessories including clamping, supply of clamps termination at both ends, providing and fixing metallic tags and hydraulic testing as per Standard given below but exclusive of supply of tube/ fitting and insulation as per standards
DRILLING AND THREADING OF BLIND FLANGES
Making of 1/2" screwed connections on 1-1/2" blind flanges of specified materials/ ratings, by drilling holes and tapping
